content:
Sure, here are five deep questions based on the teachings of J Krishnamurti:

1. "What is the nature of thought and how does it shape our perception of reality?"
2. "How does the self, as a mental construct, influence our relationships with others and the world?"
3. "What is the root cause of suffering and how can it be transformed?"
4. "What is true freedom and how can it be achieved?"
5. "How does the conditioning of society impact our individual consciousness and behavior?"
